event.title: Loic Le Meur #tweetup (we are fully booked!)
event.description:
We are fully booked and no longer accepting new registration.*

SeesmicのCEOであるLoic Le Meurさんが急遽来日するとのことなので、tweetupを開催することになりました。

Loic Le Meur,CEO of Seesmic is coming to Tokyo so we’re holding a tweetup with him.

Twitter: @loic
Blog: http://loiclemeur.com

The address to the place is:
Daikanyama Digital Gate Bldg.,
3-5-7 Ebisu-minami, Shibuya-ku,
Tokyo 150-0022, Japan

You can find a map here:
http://garage.co.jp/en/corporate/access.html

We will have food and drinks.

Please bring snacks/drinks/gadgets you want to share,
if you have something cool you want to show, bring it along as well:)

The event is sponsored by Seesmic and is free of charge!
event.address: 東京都渋谷区恵比寿南3-5-7 代官山DGビル(デジタルゲートビル)
